name: Don't stop running (BowserJ)
description:
In this game, you need to go through some wild parcour action without hesitating! Only one small moment of standing still is deadly. So, you need to be on the run, always! 

Made in 4 hours as a challenge between me and Zomlord.

His game: https://zomlord.itch.io/dont-die

Making a game in 1 day ft. Zomlord - YouTube

Hope you guys like it!
